name: Fun Block Puzzle - Brain Game
description:
Easy to play but challenging puzzle game!

Fun block puzzle is a block game. Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. More blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game.

How to play:
- Drag blocks to fill up the lines vertically or horizontally.
- Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score.
- Game over if no room for extra blocks.

Game Features:
- Block puzzle game
- Simple and easy to use
- Gem blocks cannot change shape
- Gem blocks of different shapes and colors

Play this block game to relax and train your brain. You can play this fun puzzle block anytime and anywhere!

Quickly , let's enjoy this classic block puzzle game.
